title: Haven
description: Arianna Castelle has always felt out of place. From juggling the responsibilities of raising her little sister, to caring for an alcoholic father. It’s nearly impossible for her to find a safe place to land.The only time she finds peace, is in her dreams, with him.The only problem? The charming and mysterious man she’s fallen for, Alexander Thane, doesn’t live in her world.She dreams of him, and his magical land, but they can never touch. Until the dream unexpectedly shifts, and the rose that he laid in her palm pricks her skin in the morning light.Anxious, driven, and hopelessly in love. Arianna embarks on an impossible quest to save herself, and her sister from the cruel world they live in.But is Haven really the fairytale land that it seems?
author: H.L. Swan
